scripts.codegen: rm -rf generated/ && graph codegen && yarn eslint --config ./.eslintrc.json --fix generated/
scripts.deploy:hosted: source .subgraph-version && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ olympusdao/rbs
scripts.deploy:studio: source .subgraph-version && source .env && graph deploy --product subgraph-studio --version-label $SUBGRAPH_VERSION --deploy-key $GRAPH_STUDIO_TOKEN olympus-rbs
